title: Idyllic Countryside Escape with Indulgent Dining and Wine Tasting
description:
Discover the charms, gastronomic delights and fine wines of Italy’s Emilia-Romagna region with a luxury stay at the boutique Borgo Condé Wine Resort, nestled amid the rolling hills of Forli⁠-a picturesque medieval city less than an hour's drive from Bologna.

Your Italian escape includes daily continental buffet breakfast and nightly three-course dinner with a glass of wine per person, a wine tasting experience with a guided tour of the cellar, complimentary access to the hotel’s spa and a bottle of local wine on arrival.
offer_address: Via delle Caminate 50, Strada Provinciale, 125, 47121 Forlì FC, Italy
